Summary: Strange triangle of lights appeared over my house.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Adelaide
There were no other sightings in Adelaide on or around March 26th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsNow i'm just a simple person, with little education, and only humble beginnings, but i know a genuine phenonemon when i sees one. Now on occasions i can be an arrogant person, and many of my friends have deserted me because of this, which meant i was all by my self when i saw this object. it was only a brief glimpse, yet i knew i'd seen something spectacular. it was flying low over the ground, and seemed to have 3 strange lights blinking on it. this was the triangle i saw. i also heard this great roar, but it was like you know unworldly, as in not from around here. it scared me. i hesitate to tell you this, as i told no one of this before, and it terrified me.
